thread.title: Johnny Master to compose dance steps for Akhil
thread.title_full: Johnny Master to compose dance steps for Akhil - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Johnny Master to compose dance steps for Akhil
text: Shooting of Akhil's debut film is going on a brisk pace, and after wrapping up some dance sequences in the beautiful locales of Europe, the unit has now shifted to Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad. Akhil's introduction song is being shot from today and renowned choreographer Johnny Master is composing the dance moves for this energetic number. A total of five humongous sets have been erected in this prestigious studio for this song and producer Nithin is supervising the proceedings personally. The audio of the film will be launched on Sunday in Hyderabad and massive plans are being made to make this event a memorable one.
